mission.title: Mission & Goals
mission.subtitle: Learn about our vision and mission
mission.missionText: Creative Georgia's mission is to support Georgian arts and creative industries, promote the development of young artists, and facilitate the realization of creative projects through competitions and grants.
mission.missionText2: We are supporters of all creators who have the vision and enthusiasm for the development and transmission of Georgia's cultural heritage.
mission.goalsText: Our goal is to make Georgia a regional center for creative arts where every talented creator can realize their projects and achieve international success with our support and resources.
mission.goal1: Supporting artists and creators through financial and professional resources
mission.goal2: Helping and long-term support in realizing creative projects
mission.goal3: Promoting Georgian arts both in Georgia and internationally
mission.goal4: Developing creative industries and encouraging professionalism
mission.value1Desc: We support unique ideas and innovative approaches
mission.value2Desc: We provide equal opportunities to all talented creators
mission.value3Desc: With our support, artists achieve the highest results

application.agreementsDescription: Please review and accept all agreements before submitting your application. You can click to view the full text.
application.allAgreementsChecked: All agreements are checked ✓ You can proceed
application.agreement1Short: I confirm that I will place the logo of LEPL Creative Georgia on advertising materials in the project
application.logoPlacementFull:
I, the applicant, confirm and agree to the following:

  1. All advertising, informational and promotional materials created within the framework of the project, including banners, flyers, posters, digital platforms and other means, will obligatorily include the official logo of LEPL Creative Georgia;
  2. The logo will be placed in accordance with the official brand book provided by the organization, with appropriate size and visibility;
  3. Logo placement will occur on all publications related to the funded project;
  4. If media coverage, interviews or other public events occur within the project, the role and support of LEPL Creative Georgia must be acknowledged;
  5. In case of failure to fulfill this obligation, LEPL Creative Georgia has the right to demand full or partial refund of financing.

With this agreement, I confirm that I have fully reviewed and accepted the above obligations.
application.agreement2Short: I agree to the processing of personal data in accordance with Georgian legislation
application.personalDataFull:
I, the applicant, hereby confirm that:

  1. I agree to the processing of my personal data by LEPL Creative Georgia for the purposes of reviewing the application, evaluating the project, executing contracts, reporting and monitoring;
  2. The data I provide includes personal information, contact details, financial information and other necessary documents;
  3. LEPL Creative Georgia has the right to transfer my personal data to third parties (public institutions, auditors, banking organizations) solely for the purpose of project implementation;
  4. Data will be processed in accordance with Georgian legislation, including the Law of Georgia on Personal Data Protection;
  5. I have the right to request access, correction or deletion of my personal data at any time;
  6. I confirm that all information provided is accurate and correct.

With this consent, I confirm that I have fully reviewed the terms of personal data processing and agree to them.
application.agreement3Short: I have reviewed and agree to the funding rules and conditions
application.fundingTermsTitle: Confirmation of Funding Rules and Conditions
application.fundingTermsFull:
I, the applicant, confirm that:

  1. I have fully reviewed the funding rules, conditions and procedures of LEPL Creative Georgia;
  2. I understand and accept the obligation that financing will be used only within the approved project and budget;
  3. I am obliged to submit financial and narrative reports during the project implementation period within established deadlines;
  4. In case of misuse of financing, I am obliged to return the full amount with penalties;
  5. I agree to project monitoring and inspection by LEPL Creative Georgia or its representatives;
  6. I confirm that after project completion I will submit a final report and supporting documentation;
  7. Any unused funds from the project must be returned to the organization within the established period;
  8. I agree that information about the project may be used for public reporting and promotion purposes of LEPL Creative Georgia.

With this agreement, I confirm that I have fully reviewed the funding rules and accept all the above obligations.
application.agreement4Short: I declare that all information provided is accurate and correct and I take full responsibility
application.declarationFull:
I, the applicant, by signing this document:

  1. Declare that all information, data and documents provided in the application and attached documents are accurate, correct and complete;
  2. Confirm that I have no conflict of interest with LEPL Creative Georgia or its representatives;
  3. Confirm that I am not involved in criminal proceedings and have no conviction for economic crimes;
  4. Confirm that I possess all necessary licenses and permits to implement the project;
  5. I take full responsibility for the accuracy of the information provided and confirm that in case of providing false information, LEPL Creative Georgia has the right to:
    • Refuse to review the application;
    • Terminate financing;
    • Demand full refund of already paid amounts;
    • Exclude the applicant or beneficiary from future competitions;
  6. I confirm that I have fully reviewed the application form, funding rules and agree to all conditions;
  7. I undertake to comply with Georgian legislation throughout the project implementation period;
  8. I agree that in case of improper project execution or violation of deadlines, LEPL Creative Georgia has the right to apply sanctions provided by the contract.

By submitting this application, I confirm acceptance of all the above points and agree to full responsibility.
